summary: This document is a property deed and associated filing paperwork for the sale of a Manhattan townhouse at 9 East 71st Street from Nine East 71st Street Corporation to Maple, Inc. for a nominal sum of $10.00. The document includes notarized signatures from Jeffrey E. Epstein as President of the seller corporation and establishes the Virgin Islands-based Maple, Inc. as the new owner.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.role: President of Nine East 71st Street Corporation (Grantor/Seller)
persons.context: Appears as the President of the selling corporation, personally executing the deed and associated affidavits for the transfer of the 9 East 71st Street property.

persons.name: Erika Kellerhals
persons.context: Listed as the buyer's attorney and the return contact for the deed filing, with an address in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Agustin
persons.context: Acted as the agent for Stewart Title to present the deed for recording with the NYC Department of Finance.

connections.description: Epstein is identified as the President of the corporation, acting on its behalf in the property sale.
Kellerhals is listed as the attorney for the buyer, Maple, Inc., handling the property transfer.
Epstein, via the corporation he leads, sold a valuable Manhattan property to Maple, Inc. for a nominal $10.

events.title: Sale of 9 East 71st Street Property
events.description: Nine East 71st Street Corporation sold the property at 9 East 71st Street, Manhattan, to Maple, Inc. for $10.00.

events.title: Execution and Notarization of Deed
events.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein executed the deed as President of the seller corporation, and the document was notarized in the U.S. Virgin Islands.

events.title: Recording of Deed
events.description: The deed and associated transfer documents were officially recorded with the NYC City Register's office.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, Manhattan, New York, NY 10065 (the property sold)
St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands 00802 (address for buyer Maple, Inc. and attorney Erika Kellerhals)
New York, New York 10065 (address of Nine East 71st Street Corporation)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein, as President of Nine East 71st Street Corporation, sold the Manhattan townhouse at 9 East 71st Street to Maple, Inc., a U.S. Virgin Islands corporation, for only $10.00.
The transaction documents were notarized in the U.S. Virgin Islands, connecting the property transfer to Epstein's network in that territory.
The buyer's attorney was Erika Kellerhals, Esq., based in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands.
The document includes redacted witness names (e.g., 'CaRett.1..I.rearace4', 'aerr Catzaav'), indicating the notarization involved other individuals whose names are partially obscured.
The property is described as a one-family dwelling on Block 1386, Lot 10 in Manhattan.
